研究强调了大脑数量处理的灵活性美国国家信息与通信技术研究所（NICT，总裁：Tokuda Hideyuki，Ph.D.）通过基于fMRI的大脑活动分析揭示了人类脑皮层中的多个地区灵活地代表数值数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-highlights-the-the-flexible-nature-nature-nature-numerical-quantity-quantity-porcessing-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-highlights-the-the-flexible-nature-nature-nature-numerical-quantity-quantity-porcessing-in-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86201C9B-96D7-4EE2-85F5-4BA87CC7944E Wed, 26 Mar 2025 12:21:47 -0400 Study highlights the flexible nature of numerical quantity processing in the brain
tick传播病毒疾病威胁中国东北部的公共卫生宣布了《人畜共患杂志》的新文章出版物。中国东北部的壁虱传播疾病发病率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/tick-borne-viral-diseases--theaten-public-health-health-inhealth-in-northeasestern-china.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/tick-borne-viral-diseases--theaten-public-public-health-health-north-northeasestern-china.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8408E69C-FAA6-4804-AADA-B9005D744837 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 12:13:36 -0400 Tick-borne viral diseases threaten public health in Northeastern China

希望之城研究人员发现了肿瘤形成的两步过程希望之城的研究人员是，美国新闻与世界报道的美国国家医疗中心（National Medical Center）最大，最先进的癌症研究和治疗机构之一，名为《全美癌症》中的前五名，他发现细胞突变是必要的，但并不总是足以形成肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/city-of-hope-researchers-uncover-uncover-the-two-step-process-process-of-tumor-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/city-of-hope-researchers-uncover-uncover-the-two-step-process-ercess-of-tumor-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb933ab6-bb24-4A57-907C-7998617A917F Wed, 26 Mar 2025 10:31:19 -0400 City of Hope researchers uncover the two-step process of tumor formation
解决新兴成年中的心血管危险因素根据今天在美国心脏协会杂志上发表的新美国心脏协会科学陈述的数据，许多青少年进入了患有心血管疾病的重要危险因素，从青春期到成年的过渡是解决这些危险因素并降低发展未来心血管疾病的风险的关键时机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/addressing-cardiescular-risk-factors-in-emering-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/addressing-cardiescular-risk-risk-factors-in-emerging-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8935CA7-CF00-4373-91DD-779EFB183ECB Wed, 26 Mar 2025 09:44:09 -0400 Addressing cardiovascular risk factors in emerging adulthood

早期工作开始时间与季节性变化有关那些早些时候开始工作的人对季节性变化更加不适。这是一项研究的主要结论，即圣地亚哥大学的讲师（USC）和塞维利亚大学（美国），豪尔赫·米拉·佩雷斯（JorgeMiraPérez）和乔格·米拉·玛丽亚·马丁·奥拉拉（JoseMiraPérez）和何塞·玛丽亚·马丁·奥拉拉（JoséMaríaMartínOlallaOlalla Olalla）刚刚在《 Chronobiology International》杂志上发表在《 Chronobiology International》杂志上，并详细分析了公共咨询委员会成员的成员，该委员会成员在2018年成立了28次欧洲委员会成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/early-work-start-times-linkes-to-discomfort-with-seasonal-time-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/early-work-start-times-linds-lind-to-discomfort-with-seasonal time-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ef72fd5-ce90-4928-be09-be09-3d563cd78227 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 09:23:03 -0400 Early work start times linked to discomfort with seasonal time changes
